body:
This includes:
- use system layout by default
- prevent building multi- and single-threaded libs when using system layout
- build multi-threaded libs by default
- add in symlinks which emulate tagged layout when multithreaded libs are built with system layout (for packages like valgrind which expect the -mt suffix)

This addresses #710 (reasoning here also suggests that multi-threaded libs will nearly always be suitable as a drop-in replacement for single-threaded libs) and #1820.
title: Use boost system layout by default
